title: The Hard Work Of Happiness
description:
Your joy is your job. In “The Hard Work Of Happiness,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that the strategy for lasting happiness requires us to put our faith in charge of our feelings.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr
